name: Cosmopoly
description:
COSMOPOLY is an economic/random/strategic board game for groups of up to 6 players.
Look for optimal ways, hope for luck and capture as many businesses on the field as possible, avoiding penalty cells and other people's businesses.

Build your strategy by collecting and using items at the right moment.

Be careful and monitor the situation in the system, Anthony will help you keep up to date with all the latest news. And don't forget, the longer the game goes on, the higher the penalties and costs!

Take money from other players, make profitable deals and become the richest man in the solar system! And detailed statistics at the end of the game will help you analyze the game and measure success with other players.

Chat, argue, laugh and have fun
